website_summaries.verdict: A versatile set by a popular manufacturer. With different sizes and lids, these glass bowls will serve many purposes in your kitchen.
pros: Made of Pyrex, a popular, reasonably sturdy glass that earns praise for being oven, microwave, freezer, and dishwasher-safe
Bowls come in 4 sizes, and include BPA-free lids
Suitable for mixing and storing food
cons: Flaws in the glass are possible, including nicks, small chips, lines, and bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Bowl shattered in micowave
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are microwave safe. However, one of mine shattered while being microwaved.
customer_reviews.author: Blake B.

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex, nothing more to say.  But I will anyway...
customer_reviews.text: We have used Pyrex products in many areas around our kitchen. I needed more mixing bowls, so I went with Pyrex. I love that they are clear. I have thrown away many different food products that were stored in a metal container. I cannot see the contents, so I forget I need to use up the items. With glass, I get the ease of cleaning, avoid plastic 'bad stuff', and can see what I am storing. All of my Pyrex products have been amazing. Great brand and great products for me over the past 15 years. These mixing bowls are just as amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O.

customer_reviews.title: 5-star Pyrex Quality -- Great for Multipurpose Use!
customer_reviews.text: Totally recommend this for anyone who is looking for multi-purpose bowls. These are perfect for storage (they come with colorful lids!), serving, or cooking/baking. Only thing to note: if you use these for baking purposes, the bowls are a little bit shallow, so trying to use a mixer can get a little tricky or messy (but it's totally do-able). They're typical 5-star Pyrex quality, I've had mine for 4 years now with no chips, cracks, scratches, or issues. I don't usually wash the larger ones in the dish washer (they take up a lot of space), but the smaller ones have gone through the dishwasher without incident. Totally recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful bowls
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful bowls, ordered 2-3 days ago and received today. I do the meal prep and I do the cooking at home. When I cooked last week for a group of Church friends and had to transport the food to the church I realized how antiquated our kitchen bowls were. So without telling the wife I got on my favorite website to shop, and today I received the benefit of that shopping episode. When the wife asked what got into me that i purchased kitchen stuff, I told her I had to because I was depressed so I went shopping. That diffused the encounter, so she said I totally understand because "that's what i do when i am depressed", success.
customer_reviews.author: speaks the truth

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and use these all the time now.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and lids make it very convenient. I’ve used all the bowls and they all clean up easy enough in the dishwasher. Was able to make a huge pasta salad in the biggest bowl, then filled up the 2.5 quart bowl, stuck the lid on the leftovers for the fridge and brought the smaller salad to a friend’s party. The 2.5 quart held a lot and was the perfect size for the party. The lids make it much more versatile. Bought another set as part of a housewarming gift. Friend was happy to receive it, but it did make the gift really heavy with the other items.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli S.

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I like these bowls because of the various sizes and the lids fit snug on them. I haven't dropped them, but they are heavy enough to likely survive a short drop. They are very easy to clean and durable as well. Excellent choice for the price and have lots of uses, although I'm not sure If I would put them in the freezer as the plastic lids might crack or liquids would expand and bust the glass. If you want to put a glass bowl in the freezer, oven, or microwave then do so at your own risk. I've personally only had them in the refrigerator, but not anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love these bowls. My only con is that the lids aren't super tight, so something might spill if it isn't sitting properly. I discovered this when marinating chicken. I threw the chicken in a bowl with the sauce and decided that I'd just put the lid on and shake the bowl around to coat the chicken. Quickly discovered the con as some sauce came flying out from where the lid doesn't fit perfectly against the bowl. Other than that, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I use these bowls all the time - they are glass, so a little fragile. They are Pyrex which means they can be used in a variety of temperature situations. I like them much better than my stainless steel bowls. One bad thing - I used the large bowl to steam some tofu in a microwave; recipe called for doing it in a covered bowl for 7 minutes. I was concerned with pressure build up, so I did not complete the cover seal. The cover is deformed - I doubt the warranty will cover the cover. But life is about learning :-)
customer_reviews.author: genie

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex, You Can’t Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Pyrex has been around forever, and once again proof of why. Pyrex bowls are great and haven’t changed much and there is no reason why they should. The lids are a nice touch and the fact that they nestle into each other is a real space saver. You might want to hand wash the lids or be careful how you put them in the dishwasher. If they get contorted and heated they like to stay that way, and can make them harder to seal on the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and the perfect sizes for mixing dough
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat Pyrex for quality. These bowls are just the right size for the bread baking I've started doing. They are sturdy and the perfect sizes for mixing dough, letting dough rise, mixing wet ingredients prior to mixing with dry ingredients. I really like these bowls and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: DecemberBaby

customer_reviews.title: ... really needed a set of mixing bowls and I liked that these had a lid
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a set of mixing bowls and I liked that these had a lid. They are nice sizes and very sturdy, but being glass are a little heavy. I would have given 5 stars, but one of my bowls came with a crack in it. The crack didn't go all the way through the bowl ( it was cracked on the outside but the glass is thick so it wasn't cracked all the way through to the inside). I would have returned them, but the bowl can still work and I needed to use them as soon as I got them so returning it just wasn't worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa White

customer_reviews.title: Busy Bowls
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of bowls so much that I got a set for a niece's wedding shower. The set has a nice array of nesting bowl sizes. I use the plastic lids quite a bit when storing food items in the refrigerator and for covering the large bowl when letting dough rise. The glass is nice when heating things in the microwave. Very practical set that gets lots of use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MtnLady

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls!
customer_reviews.text: These are great bowls. I especially like having the large 4qt bowls. Got these on Amazon for half the price they were at Target for the same ones!
customer_reviews.author: mommy of 2 angels

customer_reviews.title: The Pyrex Bowls are heavy duty and easy to use with great locking lids.
customer_reviews.text: The Pyrex bowls are heavy duty. They are made to last for years to come. The lids are great. They seal very well. I have used each bowl with and with out the lids. With the lids they are great for storage. I have used them as mixing bowls. Very easy to clean with soap and water. The rounded lip at the top of the Pyrex bowl makes it easy to grip and hold onto while using. For me these Pyrex bowls are great.
customer_reviews.author: Gato

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these, a little smaller than I thought.I had had a huge Pyrex mixing bowl and was trying to replace it. The biggest in the set was smaller that my previous bowl. These are great and no regrets, I really like the lids my other mixing bowls did have those. Helps keep the need for cling wrap down so they are better for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: How not to use these!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this product to that I could the small bowl as a pot in pot in my Instant Pot. When the product came, the infomation said that it could NOT be used in an electric pressure cooker. What a disapointment! The bowls are sturdy and have good lids. It is extremely difficult for me to remove the lids when there is food in them. I don't know why that is. The seal is so tight that nothing could possibly spill. I can still use the product but I just wanted to warn Instant Pot users.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: I am never disappointed when I buy a Pyrex product. Not only are they durable but they are super practical for storage. I have had a set that we received as a wedding present 13 years ago, they have been used and abused and they still look decent. I ordered this new set because they were part of the flash sale for $17.99 and because they have lids and well can one really have enough bowls?? Pyrex never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Condon

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for value, longevity, and versatility.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for these mixing bowls. The Pyrex material is strong, sturdy (I haven't dropped any, but I will clang them around), and easy to throw in the dishwasher. The lids snap on well and make for great lunch containers to take to work, and also stack nicely in the fridge. I find them better used as serving bowls or as leftover containers rather than mixing, due to the shorter nature of them, but you could certainly use them for mixing. I also do not believe they are completely airtight, and I am careful if I take them to work to keep them properly upright. We liked them enough that we bought a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob G. Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely versatile. I use all of them constantly. The lids are tight and have not warped even though I store them vertically, separate from the bowls. Not as heavy as you would expect. Very easy to clean and store. No worries about scratching or breakage when I nest them.
customer_reviews.author: bob r

customer_reviews.title: Great size and handy
customer_reviews.text: These are very useful mixing bowls. I use them for making salads, mixing batter, and making dressings /marinades. Nice shape and that they aren't too deep. The rims are comfortable for holding when pouring. I tried stainless bowls from Costco and they were too deep and not as comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a good product
customer_reviews.text: Good variety of sizes. The lids fit great. I bought the set for mixing/baking, but have used the smaller two for fridge storage a few times. Would be an excellent gift for housewarming or someone learning to bake. The nesting means you can have a lot of large bowls without taking U.K. excessive space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE—STILL HAVE THEM AFTER 6 YEARS
customer_reviews.text: I like that these bowls nest well together. Six years on, they are still in great condition! We didn’t use them on a daily basis, mainly for baking and storing salads. I also made a point to hand wash the plastic lids instead of placing in the dishwasher to prolong their life.
customer_reviews.author: Essie

customer_reviews.title: I do a lot of baking using meringues and somewhere I read that meringues form better in glass bowls
customer_reviews.text: I was actually looking at stainless bowls when I saw these. My mind went back and forth -- stainless versus pyrex, metal versus glass. Although the glass bowls are weigh more than stainless and they will break if dropped, I decided on the pyrex. Pyrex can go in the dishwasher in the same load as my silverware and the smallest one will probably fit in my microwave if needed. I do a lot of baking using meringues and somewhere I read that meringues form better in glass bowls. I do not know for sure if that is true or not.
customer_reviews.author: Woods Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of bowls
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this set of bowls a 5 but am holding back hoping Pyrex will perhaps "re-figure" the diameter of the bowls. The bowls take up more width room in my bowl drawer. I was hoping they would be the same width as my Tupperware set of bowls. They are not. They nest nicely and are perfect in all other ways except this.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are terrific. I prefer to keep soups in glass, rather than plastic, containers because the plastic containers seem to hold on to the grease whereas the glass clean right up. I love the different sizes and the lids fit so well. I have two sets of these as I find them to be very versatile. I love to freeze a big batch of chili or spaghetti sauce or even oatmeal in them to take on trips and heat up when I get where I'm going. I do catering for retreats and have to take a weekends worth of food to the event site. These are a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: loves to read

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Bowls for the Non-Necromancer In Your Life
customer_reviews.text: Got these on a deal-of-the-day type of special. Second set of them. You never know when you'll need big (or small!) glass bowls with a lid. I suppose if you are one of those necromancer types who need to store brains or eye or newt in something a bit more... secure (and probably airtight), these might not be for you. Luckily, I'm not a necromancer, and as far as I know, neither is my wife. She might be though. She's kind of sneaky. Now I'm really suspicious as to why I'm so pleased to own this set of glass bowls. I think I might have been tricked. (nope, they're inexpensive and excellent, even if I don't store brains in them)
customer_reviews.author: AngryGames

customer_reviews.title: Love these Pyrex nesting bowls
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this purchase. I've been using Pyrex bowls for years and for the first time, I finally splurged to get these four nesting bowls with lids. The lids, BTW, are sturdy. The bowls are just the right size for so many things I do around the kitchen. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Izzie

customer_reviews.title: These will 'bowl' you over...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to America's Test Kitchen for reviewing the best bowls for your home kitchen...these are a solid purchase and the lids definitely help prevent the molten lava from spilling onto the pristine counter tops. Disaster avoided.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM J. CANTU

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sizes and a great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bowls! I needed glass bowls for my baking and candy making projects and these are all of the right sizes for an excellent price. The lids fit are labeled with the size of the bowls which is handy. Great value and Pyrex is a brand I always trust. I expect that these will last for years
customer_reviews.author: WhatTheJules

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Four bowls with lids for an amazing price. These are classic bowls and the lids are just an extra bonus. They are great for any kind of cooking or baking and make a nice presentation for serving as well. You can't go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best to nest
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I have a thing for bowls or things in general with lids. These are great....you can put most of the into the large bowl and also store the lids in there too. I have not used them yet to do a lot of mixing so I don't know how well they are suited for that yet. We have used them to mix meat and things like that and it was nice to have these. The lids fit well on the bowls. I got a great price on these too so very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hi from WA

customer_reviews.title: Everyone's happy
customer_reviews.text: My wife should be writing this, but she won't, so....she loves the bowls, no complaints so far. She has relegated our old set of plastic mixing bowls to our grandson (20 months) who finds all sorts of uses for a set of scraped, cut, stained bowls. It is worth the price of the new bowls just to watch him play with the old ones (I know this isn't relevant, but grandparents have license to prattle on like this :>) The only potential negative is that the new bowls are heavy, but hey, they're glass, so heavy should be expected. Momma's happy, grandson's happy, price is right so I'm happy. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Just received so hard to evaluate. Same as my Mothers so assume good. My mother has had them for years.
customer_reviews.author: pilot

customer_reviews.title: Can never go wrong with Pyrex
customer_reviews.text: This set is HEAVY but I knew what to expect with Pyrex. They are just the right size, love having the lids. I haven't used them in the oven, but when/if I do I don't expect to have a problem since my casserole dishes are also Pyrex.
customer_reviews.author: MartyH

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! I saw these in a large store for $21.99. I was happy to find then on Amazon for about $5 less. I do lot like plastic containers for anything, especially my food. The lids are leak proof and as with any glass, always easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Maacje

customer_reviews.title: Essential set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is essential for a family who cooks often and enjoys left overs. We have eliminated 85% of our plastics and have gotten a lot of use out of this set. It's perfect for storing oatmeal, hearty soups and of course, for mixing ingredients while cooking. It's wonderful they can go from fridge to freezer to microwave. Keeping the refrigerator organized is made easier with these bowls. I also recommend some of the other Pyrex storage to compliment this set. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Mama

customer_reviews.title: Lids suck!
customer_reviews.text: One of the lids warped in the microwave after only a few uses. The whole point of buying these bowls is that they have lids and the instructions say you can use them in the microwave. Unfortunately, you can’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jopshio Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This set was the only one I found which consisted of 4 glass bowls plus plastic lids. I do a lot of baking and cooking so the largest bowl (4 quarts) is great. Made of clear Pyrex glass they allow me to see what's inside. The lids close tightly, are colorful, and are perfect for refrigerator storage. The bowls are microwave, freezer, and dishwasher-safe which makes them extremely versatile. The only one minor inconvenience is that the bowls do not have a pour spout but that is very minor. Strongly recommend for price and value.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for everything from preparing foods, to serving and storing.
customer_reviews.author: Russell P

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Several of the bowls have folks and tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Several of the bowls have folks and tiny cracks in the bottom. The big one has a large sticker-shaped indentation in the glass itself, on the bottom. This is the second set I've owned, and if this is the quality Pyrex accepts these days, then Pyrex is no longer the name it once was. AVOID THESE.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Stillinger

customer_reviews.title: I love my new bowls!
customer_reviews.text: I am working on eliminating plastic containers from my house, so I was glad to find these Pyrex nesting bowls. I like the fact that they save space since they are nesting. The larger bowls are larger than I expected. I was surprised to find them at such a great price. I have owned many Pyrex containers over the years. Always good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debra C.

customer_reviews.title: The 2.5qt bowl has an issue with the lid fitting properly.
customer_reviews.text: I love using Pyrex. I own a lot of it. I purchased this same set of bowls in store years ago, so when I needed another set I didn't hesitate. The set I received from Amazon looks the same as my other set in every way, except there's an issue with the 2.5 qt bowl. The lid just sits on top of the bowl instead of fitting securely. I tried the lid on my other set of bowls and it fits just fine so I imagine that something is slightly off with the size and/or shape of the bowl itself. Perhaps just a defect with the set I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bowls. I didn’t like that they jumped in price by over $10 from the time I put them on my wish list to the time I purchased (less than a week), but I love the bowls, so it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Beaudoin

customer_reviews.title: Not typical Pyrex quality .... cheat
customer_reviews.text: These are awkward sizes, slippery, and hard to store . They sold some Pyrex at Costco I thought these were like them; I was wrong . I can’t even put soup in the large bowl as I will Drop it! It’s too big and heavy!
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly useful, they are all excellent sizes and the first things I reach to store left overs! You get a good bang for the buck and I would definitely purchase more of these as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without these for so long?
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for anyone with a kitchen who likes to cook or bake. I have had them for less than a month and already gotten a ton of use out of them. My sister-in-law has a set that I see her use almost every time we cook together and I have been wanting some of my own forever. I don't know why I waited so long to make the purchase, but I'm glad that I finally did as it was the best buy I have made in a long time. You can not beat the price or the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why I didnt buy these sooner. These are heavy duty glass bowls you will have forever I'd you treat them right. They are easily stackable. They are air tight. They will treat you right.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I had used another set for several years but they were the unfortunate victims of bumbling teenage boys! This set was even better! So far they have held up well to heat and cold as both storage, mixing, and microwave bowls. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: ALR

customer_reviews.title: when I can have things which nest easily and have easy to find lids
customer_reviews.text: These are actually my second set of these bowls, and not because the first ones (a wedding gift from five years ago) had any problems with them. I simply got more so I could throw out all my plastic and miscellaneous mixing bowls. At this low price, why would I keep my random assortment of college stuff, when I can have things which nest easily and have easy to find lids? And they look pretty nice on display, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dione Basseri

customer_reviews.title: Size versatility
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set with good size versatility. I plan to use them for food storage. I finally have a bowl with a lid for my fruit salad and won't have to struggle with plastic wrap to cover it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Good brand, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's really a good brand producing good products. I love this bow set with different sizes. I love mixing eggs in the bowls because it's made of glass and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Huixin pan

customer_reviews.title: Most used item in my Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I break Pyrex, somehow. I had purchased this set at a store, and broke the largest one. I ordered a whole new set knowing I would use them all, in fact this set is probably the single most used kitchen item in my home. I love them, they are sturdy and SO useful for banking, left overs etc etc. My cousin is having a house warming next month, and I intend on getting him a set, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me
customer_reviews.text: When I use these bowls for mixing they are just angled enough that whatever is in them has a tendency to slosh out. That being said they wash well, have been successfully microwaved without incident and are nice enough to take a dish to a potluck. They stack extremely well with each other too, however, stack less nicely with my other bowls. That being said, you really don't need more than these four as they are all good sizes.
customer_reviews.author: SanSerif

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sizes for all my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizes for all my needs. The bowls have a lip which makes the sturdy plastic lids fit snug. I wash the lids in the top rack of my dishwasher with no problems and the bowls themselves come out sparkling clean at each washing in the lower rack. I love the different colored lids since I know which lid goes with which bowl...very easy to keep them all together when your storage dictates nesting the bowls and putting the lids to the side! Bes t set of bowl that I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Karinbee

customer_reviews.title: L♥VE These Bowls
customer_reviews.text: I do everything with these bowls. The largest bowl I let my whole-grain dough rise; also make a large batch of yogurt. The smaller bowl I keep my sour-dough starter in. I have 2 sets and will probably buy more. The other sizes are great for fruits, salads, leftovers, mixing batters, meatloaf, marinating meat for jerky or the grill...so versatile. I love these bowls. They are mixing bowls, I wouldn't use them in the oven since I've read quite a few horror stories of them shattering.
customer_reviews.author: sailorTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Love these bowls
customer_reviews.text: I bought same bowls 10ish years ago. My kids dropped the well used big bowl and it broke, hence the second buy. I love these bowls and the lids. The glass is very thick. I use they for baking, cooking, and storing food. These are my go-to bowls for everything.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bowls
customer_reviews.text: Very useful set of bowls which I bought as a gift for my daughter. She's delighted and uses them all the time. Price is right too....
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for from a name you can trust! Allows me to serve meals like spaghetti & meatballs in a a nice bowl for presentation purposes then straight to fridge for easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: KSS

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make Chex mix in the microwave. My largest bowls were wither plastic or stainless steal. Glass is much more attractive and versatile. No odors permeate. Make it and store it are easy with the clearly-labeled and colorful lids. My family is happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi 9265

customer_reviews.title: These are the essential bowls you need and will use often.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bowls on Amazon almost 5 years ago now and really I don't know how I managed in the kitchen before then. These are durable, useful and attractive enough to serve out of. They are microwave, freezer, dishwasher and oven safe (except the lids...do not put lids in the oven like I accidentally did with one of them...don't ask...) Not only that, they stack so neatly that they don't take up much room in the cupboard. If you're hesitating on buying these STOP HESITATING! Just buy them. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice sizes
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Lids probably will not last more than a few years, but I just wanted a set of big glass bowls. Great for storage and mixing. Great price. Small to large sizes. Perfectd
customer_reviews.author: AMR

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat the price. I haven’t tried the lids but I’m told they’re dishwasher safe. Easy to clean, perfect for storing food. Takes up very little space which is perfect for my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: RiddleMeThis

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've been cooking forever, and just recently purchased these based on a recipe that recommended them. They are great! How did I not know about these? Made of pyrex glass (doesn't react with food), and comes with 4 sizes with fitted plastic covers. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Blues Lover

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite disappointed that one of them is about to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: After using for a year I've discovered that one of the bowls has developed a crack that now almost completely encircles the base. I've been hand washing these and using them to store food in the fridge. As they've never been dropped or stored improperly, I'm quite disappointed that one of them is about to fall apart. Must of had a crack from the start unfortunately. I've been warned that some Pyrex are lower quality than others and now I wonder if this was just a fluke or if these are improperly manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Quality is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, and it's really nice to have the multiple sizes, but the quality is lacking. Our bowls have a ton of tiny imperfections. Bubbles, pits, bumps, and one bowl even has what looks like a crack inside the glass. You can't feel the crank on the surface, so it's obviously a manufacturing flaw rather than damage from shipping. Not nearly the quality of our other Pyrex dishes.
customer_reviews.author: El Jared

customer_reviews.title: Best Glass Mixing Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Love these mixing bowls. Super durable, easy to clean, and they all come with a lid!!! Will purchase again. Great Value.
customer_reviews.author: Angel D

customer_reviews.title: nicely made
customer_reviews.text: each bowl fits inside next size up bowl, with the cover on. takes up less storage space plus you dont lose the covers.
customer_reviews.author: Brower

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: She broke one of her old ones so I bought her this set.. She is highly pleased. The lids keep food fresher longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex Is The Best
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are wonderful. I use them as mixing, storage and reheating bowls. The covers offer a tight fit for storage. They stack well in the refrigerator(except for the 4 quart bowl. It's huge). They can be used to reheat leftovers in my gas oven. They are easy to clean. This set is an excellent bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls.  Lids are a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Bowls are great- no complaints. The lids do not fit completely air tight, and I can see them cracking over time.
customer_reviews.author: brooklynmfs

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex is EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: This brand is the best for storage and mixing. I love that the lids are different colors, and everything stores nested together so they can't get lost. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had these a year now very happy just dont tip bowls upside down with cover it doesnt keep in any liquids.
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better price.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - it's Pyrex! Pyrex has been making great glass products for a hundred years. The bowls are heavyweight, easy to clean, will work in the microwave, and don't compare to the cheap plastic bowl set I've used for years. I should have bought these sooner. The lids are a nice touch - fit well - but I primarily use the bowls for cooking and mixing. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Hills

customer_reviews.title: Best bowls ever
customer_reviews.text: They're stackable, they're not ugly, they have lids, easy to clean. Love them and use them for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Serra Villa

customer_reviews.title: Great for microwaving
customer_reviews.text: All that I needed and more! They work great in my microwave for defrosting. Could also be used as serving bowls, but they’re rather plain. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these bowls. Haven't had long enough to comment on durability, but they ARE Pyrex and not a copy so expect long life. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Chipped
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately one of the bowls arrived chipped on the bottom. I only realized this after I took them out of the box, cut my foot, and was trying to figure out where the glass came from. Hence it was from where the it had chipped off the bottom of the bowl. Not sure if this happened during shipping or packed this way.
customer_reviews.author: mssdebdeb

customer_reviews.title: ... shape making fridge storage a pain but I otherwise love these bowls
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit of a weird shape making fridge storage a pain but I otherwise love these bowls. The lids fit perfectly so I can bring them to work with me for lunch. I love that I went with glass bowls cause I microwave things when needed and not need to worry about the plastic melting or I can throw the whole bowl in the oven to bake a small meal just for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: These are great for several uses and are sturdy! I love that they don’t absorb the smell and color of whatever I’m mixing in them and the tops fit securely.
customer_reviews.author: J-mann

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowls with lids
customer_reviews.text: Great storage bowls or serving bowls! Love them, but a little heavy. A good price! I would recommend these bowls.
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: These mixing bowls are perfect for mixing and storing
customer_reviews.text: Pyrex glassware is such an essential in the kitchen. These mixing bowls are perfect for mixing and storing. Glass, unlike plastic or metal, can be used with everything, such as pickling or sourdough. The glass doesn't react with acids or the fermenting process that happens with yeasts. These bowls can even go into the oven. The four-quart bowl is the perfect size for making bread. Now, with these plastic lids it will be so much easier to store things in these bowls--no need for plastic wrap! This is a great set of bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Violets

customer_reviews.title: These Containers Made A Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to have in her kitchen. She used them right away, and likes the different sizes so she can keep different items in the fridge. She especially likes the lids and the fact that she can simply reheat the items in the microwave. Highly recommend these containers.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Happy mixing!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for mixing bowls, and at first I was drawn to the stainless steel sets. After realizing that Pyrex made these, it was a no-brainer for me. Affordable, solidly built with a good weight, lids included.. this is everything i was looking for. The colorful lids also indicate what size mixing bowl it goes with, which is a nice touch! The bowls also nest for storage.. awesome!
customer_reviews.author: supershopper

customer_reviews.title: Great nesting bowls
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the rim around the bowls; the rims are flat and protrude over the edge of the bowls, but this may have been done to create a tight seal with the lids. The lids fit tightly, much better than an older Pyrex bowls set I have. I really find the large size essential for making my overnight waffle batter. I love how the lids are marked and color coded with the bowl cup volume. The bowls are plain glass, but could pass as serving bowls for a casual meal. I recommend this, and the price was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: sabby

customer_reviews.title: Bowl case chipped
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t figure out how to contact the seller (my own difficulty with the amazon app). One of the bowls came with a great big chip on the bottom. Now the box is big and heavy and I didn’t unwrap expecting to return so I don’t want to return the whole set, but would like to replace the chipped bowl! They seem good otherwise. Strong and heavy. The lids don’t fit super tightly though. Definitely not spill-proof, but I’m ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Wider than expected
customer_reviews.text: Wider than expected and takes up more space in fridge. Not as useful a design as I like.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Nesting mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: These bowl are just what i needed. Nesting so minimum storage needed and lids are included. Bowls are clear which is nice and the lids are bright colors. For kitchen prep, storage or even serving these bowl will do the job. Def will buy again. And would give as gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marietta Avrus

customer_reviews.title: They are fine so far
customer_reviews.text: They are fine so far. (I do not cook in my glass bowls--I use glassware specifically made for baking.) The set I got may have been a "seconds" because the "Pyrex" mark on the bottom is very faint and the quality of the 1.5 quart bowl in this set is lighter/thinner than the1.5 I still have from my old set.
customer_reviews.author: PSusan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for packing lunch or leftovers! No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of these and bought another because the plastic containers never seem to seal great!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I needed. The sizes of the bowls are good. The largest holds quite a lot and is good for when I make large batches of food. The smallest size is good for everyday little leftovers (leftover veggies, for example). No chips or signs of wear. They come sparkly clean from the dishwasher, but I wash the lids by hand just to be safe. Also, unlike plastic they don't stain or retain smells. Great purchase, much cheaper on amazon than in stores.
customer_reviews.author: kittyinthecity

customer_reviews.title: Nesting bowls
customer_reviews.text: Great and durable bowls and it doesn’t hurt that you can nest them to store them!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls with sturdy lids
customer_reviews.text: Great “nesting” bowls. The lids are the great part. Easy to go from table to refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Songsmith

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Pyrex bowls. I needed the largest one and this was a great buy for a complete set!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Replace your plastic for these
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I’ve given up buying the ziplock reusable plastic forever. These are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: mom loves them
customer_reviews.text: what makes mom happy deserves a 5* rating lol.... she likes them and seems to be working good
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls. Sizes are perfect for a variety of mixing! The capacity of the large bowl is especially great for mixing large quantities. The lids just add that extra wonderful feature. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage options.
customer_reviews.text: one of my bowls came with a crack in the bottom but it doesn’t affect the use, just the look. great storage. love the multiple sizes. lids work great.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Crump

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of bowls
customer_reviews.text: I chose these bowls to replace my old mixing bowls mainly because of the lids. Because this set comes with lids, the bowls can do double-duty as both mixing bowls and food storage containers. I've also used them to bring food to parties. The lids fit well and are labeled with the bowl capacity. The bowls have all the benefits of being Pyrex, meaning they're glass with no chemicals, can be microwaved, don't absorb smells/food, etc. There are 4 sizes in the set, so one is always appropriate for whatever you're doing. They nest within each other, so they don't take up too much space in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Two Sets Of These Wouldn't Be A Bad Idea!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I had a similar set of these 43 years ago when we got married. Of course, bowls got broken and lids got melted over the years and for some stupid reason we waited this long to replace them. Man do I hate opaque or translucent containers in a refrigerator that need to be opened to figure out what's in them. It's so nice to to be able to see what's in the bowls --- oh, and even nicer to be able to take the bowl from the fridge into the microwave! Ahhh! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Urbanski

customer_reviews.title: Lids are BPA free.
customer_reviews.text: I received these bowls today and love the size, shape, etc. Nowhere on the box or lids, however, does it say BPA free. I was ready to return them. But, I called the Pyrex help line and was told that all pyrex lids are BPA free. A friend of mine tells me that BPA free lids need to be hand washed for a long life. She says that if you put the lids in the dishwasher that in a relatively short time, they become dry, brittle and cracked. Thought you might want to know.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wheatley
